definition: to fight as a guerilla/(fig.) to live or eat at no fixed place

sentences.english: Your shortstop will never forget about practice again.
sentences.chinese: 您的游击手将永远不会忘记的再实践。

sentences.english: The dense forest screened the guerrillas' movements.
sentences.chinese: 密林掩护了游击队员的行动。

sentences.english: Israel says it killed at least 20 guerillas in the battle.
sentences.chinese: 以色列说，以军在战斗中至少打死20名游击队员。

sentences.english: When Japan captured Peiping, Kao led his gendarmes into the countryside to fight a guerrilla war.
sentences.chinese: 日本侵入北平后，他带领他的警察到农村打游击。

sentences.english: The aggressors could not get supplies or reinforcements through because of the guerrilla warfare.
sentences.chinese: 由于游击战的牵制，侵略者无法输送给养或援兵。

sentences.english: A correct solution of this problem is one of the prerequisites for the unhampered development of guerrilla warfare.
sentences.chinese: 这个问题的正确解决是游击战争顺利发展的条件之一。

sentences.english: In the course of this struggle we must arm the people, i. e. , organize self-defence corps and guerrilla units.
sentences.chinese: 要从这种斗争中去武装人民，即组织自卫军和游击队。

sentences.english: Expansion of Guerrilla Warfare and Establishment of Small, Concealed Guerrilla Base Areas in Enemy-Occupied Areas.
sentences.chinese: 发展敌占区的游击战争与创造隐蔽的小块游击根据地。

sentences.english: Expansion of Guerrilla Warfare and Establishment of Small, Concealed Guerrilla Base Areas in Enemy-Occupied Areas.
sentences.chinese: 发展敌占区的游击战争与创造隐蔽的小块游击根据地。

sentences.english: In the guerrilla areas, Wang continued his teaching, devoting himself particularly to children in the primary schools.
sentences.chinese: 在游击区，老王仍旧教书，他特别重视小学教育。

sentences.english: Taylor hit a ground ball to the shortstop.
sentences.chinese: 泰勒朝游击手击出一滚地球。

sentences.english: Ye Lingqing confirmed the guerrillas Lin xuan Eva is rang a marksman.
sentences.chinese: 叶凌青证实了玄娃就是响林游击队的弩箭手。

sentences.english: Mr Uribe freed scores of guerrilla prisoners.
sentences.chinese: 乌里维释放了数位被捕的游击队员。

sentences.english: We will wage guerrilla warfare against the Burmese army if conflict breaks out.
sentences.chinese: 如果开战，我们会针对缅甸政府军发起游击战。

sentences.english: These carbines were in turn given to the Viet Cong.
sentences.chinese: 这些卡宾枪再被提供给南边的越共游击队。

sentences.english: The partisan disguised himself as a peddler and got by the enemy sentry box.
sentences.chinese: 游击队员扮小贩通过敌人的岗亭。

definition: to send armed forces to suppress
to garrison/to stand guard/on garrison duty
local militia formed to suppress peasant rebellion (old)
loose and disorganized soldiers/stragglers/fig. a loner
to pursue and kill/to wipe out
